altAttribute.na: The text doesn't contain any images.
altAttribute.none: None of the {imagesWithoutAltAttribute} images contain an alternative text attribute. Add them!
altAttribute.some: Some of the {imagesWithoutAltAttribute} images contain an alternative text attribute. Add them!
altAttribute.every: All images contain an alternative text attribute. Good job!

headingStructureOrder.sequential: The heading structure is in sequential order. Good job!
headingStructureOrder.nonSequential: The heading structure is not in sequential order. Fix your heading structure!

singleH1.one: The text contains a single H1 tag. Good job!
singleH1.multiple: The text contains multiple H1 tags. Rethink your heading structure!
singleH1.none: The text contains no H1 tag. Add it!
